=User Interface=

==Overview==
The Verdi system is a multi-window application with an easy-to-use graphical user interface (GUI).

==Common User Interface Features==
The features described below are common to nWave, nTrace, nSchema, nState, and Flow View components.
  -Window Banner
  -Pull-down Menus
  -Mnemonic Keys
  -Bind Keys
  -On-line Help
  -Toolbars
  -Mouse Operation
  -Right Mouse Button Menus
